videos.description: Ty Jerome hits a deep 3, his second 3-pointer of the night, putting Virginia up 23-12.
videos.headline: Ty Jerome drains 2nd 3 of the night

videos.description: Virginia goes up 47-33 with a 3-pointer from Ty Jerome in transition.
videos.headline: Ty Jerome hits a 3 in transition

videos.description: Braxton Key throws up an alley-oop to Jay Huff who slams it, putting Virginia up big at 60-34.
videos.headline: Virginia's Huff throws down alley-oop

videos.description: Ty Jerome hits his 6th 3-pointer of the night, tying his career-high and giving him a team-leading 20 points on the night.
videos.headline: Ty Jerome sinks career-high 6th 3-pointer
